description:
Style, elegance & comfort all within one beautiful house – Aman Sandhu from The Agency presents 3 Garnet Way, Wellard to the market - welcome home!!

Nestled on a family sized 403 m2 corner block in the premium private estate “Emerald Park” in Wellard, the suburb with the FASTEST growth rate, this stylish house has a 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom, 2-car garage & a theatre with convenient side access and ample space in the backyard to play weekend footy!

This family home in Emerald Park delivers an exceptional family lifestyle with multiple living and entertaining areas.

The spacious modern layout has a lovely open plan design and designated spaces that fit together effortlessly to cater for families from all walks of life. The home is perfect for a growing family, first home buyers looking to enter the market & a long-term investor.
Hop-Skip-Jump to local park within meters of distance, spend time with little ones close to nature without having to go drive or walk them to a local school!

Extra features include:
- Ducted Reverse cycle Split Aircon system
- Solar Panels
- High Ceiling in main living area
- LED Downlights in main living
- Spacious theatre room
- Huge open plan kitchen/living/dining
- Laminated (wooden look) vinyl flooring in the main living area
- Carpets in the Bedrooms + Theatre
- Large master bedroom with His+Her robes and en-suite
- Built-in robes in all the bedrooms
- U-shaped kitchen with 600mm kitchen appliances
- Double auto lock up garage with shoppers' entry
- Artifical grass in front & backyard for super-low maintenance
- NBN Connectivity
- Additional feature/s - Garden Shed.

Local points of interest & distances –
* New COSTCO Superstore – 5 minutes
* Kwinana Shopping centre – 6 minutes
* Stockland Baldivis Shopping centre – 10 minutes
* Rockingham Shopping centre – 12 minutes
* Rockingham Foreshore & Beach – 14 minutes
* Wellard Train station - 5 minutes
* Kwinana Train station - 8 Minutes

NOTE - This proeprty is currently leased until 20/10/2023 at $520 per week, making it a perfect option for investment.

There are just too many quality items to list, this property is a Must View!

Get in touch with Aman sandhu - The Agency at 0430 883 582 to schedule an inspection.

HURRY as this WON'T last LONG!!!

Disclaimer:
This information is provided for general information purposes only and is based on information provided by the Seller and may be subject to change. No warranty or representation is made as to its accuracy and interested parties should place no reliance on it and should make their own independent enquiries.
